      • findByContent

        public java.util.List<QueryResult> findByContent(java.lang.String token,
                                        java.lang.String words)
                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                 ParseException,
                                                 RepositoryException,
                                                 DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: SearchModule
        Search for documents using it indexed content.
        指定者:
        findByContent 在接口中 SearchModule
        words - Expression to be searched.
        返回:
        A collection of document which content matched the searched expression.
        抛出:
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        java.io.IOException
        ParseException
        DatabaseException

                               DatabaseException

        指定者:
        findPaginated 在接口中 SearchModule
        params - The complex search elements.
        offset - Query result list offset.
        limit - Query result list limit.
        返回:
        A result set with the total of the results and a collection of document from the resulting query statement.

        指定者:

        A result set with the total of the results and a collection of document from the resulting query statement.
